column7: Excellent, cosy spot for a tasty dinner
column9: Myself and a colleague enjoyed our first night in Lund at this restaurant on recommendation from hotel staff. Not to mention another place we stopped recommended it so we had to try. We enjoyed the bruschetta and prosciutto/fig/goat cheese appetizer. For the main, I had...More

column7: Excellent Italian Food complimented with attentive service
column9: From the simple pizza to the more complicated dishes the food was very good and abundant.  The bruschetta was some of the best I have tasted with sweet tomatoes and lovely bread. Both the a-la-carte as well as the standard luncheon menu were very good...More

column7: Just don't order the ice cream (gelato)

We ate here on our first night in Lund. It is in a quiet courtyard with pleasant outdoor seating. The seafood pasta I had was okay, but not exceptional. Overall nice environment, good service and price in line with location
Had the seafood risotto and a Bellini. Both were yummy! Co-worker had pizza which was just ok. Definitely will be back on another work trip.

column7: Their pizzas are getting better and better
column9: I have always loved Italia’s pizzas, but I must say that they have become even better with time. A great explosion of taste in purr Italian style. The real deal!

column7: Nice restaurant on top of a excavation museum
column9: Good food for a resonable price and nice to be able to use the lunchtime to eat good food as well as getting to see some of Lunds history
The restaurant itself is off the road and is very cosy - it truly has that Italian touch and the service is great! We all had pasta and were very pleased with our experience.
It's lovely, and the staff are lovely and its a pretty place.  It's far too expensive for what it is!   Bruschetta to start with for 2 out of 3 and no desert did not make up for the bill we received.

I never get disappointed, when I come here for lunch. The pizza was delicious (and really italian style) and the price was affordable. The outside garden is one of the best places in Lund to enjoy food, when the sun is shining. Full thumbs up!

column7: A taste of Italy in Lund

The food was very Italian, nothing too fussy and the service matched the summer style of Lund - warm and friendly.

Went for dinner with my folks on a Sunday night. Food is good, as you'd expect at the price. Location is great, with the outdoor seating in a really cozy alley. Staff are nice and courteous, and service was very quick.
Nice located in the city centre and with a nice garden where you can sit in warm weather. The food was so and so, nothing special.

A pleasant atmosphere is somewhat ruined by very indifferent food. Nothing I have tasted here is not unachievable at home. Supposedly my pasta contained truffles and sirloin, however didn't really live up to expectations. Was a lot better before.

column7: Very good food in a nice place with nice staff!

Not a very large selection of wines however some nice choices is there to find.

column7: Italian restaurant in the middle of Lund

column7: Super salty food with low quality products

column7: Great Pizza in a peaceful courtyard

column7: Great and genuine Italian food and a nice yard

column7: The best kept secret in Lund
